quotes.quote: Sometimes life is like this dark tunnel. You can't always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you just keep moving... you will come to a better place.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: When you're in your darkest place, you give yourself hope and that's inner strength.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: Sometimes the best way to solve your own problems is to help someone else
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: Protection and power are overrated. I think you are very wise to choose happiness and love.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: It's time for you to look inward, and start asking yourself the big questions. Who are you? And what do you want?
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: In the darkest times, hope is something you give yourself. That is the meaning of inner strength.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: Failure is only the opportunity to begin again. Only this time, more wisely.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: Good times become good memories, but bad times become good lessons.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: Pride is not the opposite of shame, but its source. True humility is the antidote to shame.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: Are you so busy fighting you cannot see your own ship has set sail?
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: It is important to draw wisdom from many different places. If you take it from only one place, it becomes rigid and stale. Understanding others, the other elements and the other nations will help you become whole.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: Goodbye, everyone. Today, destiny is our friend. I know it
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: You sound like my nephew. Always thinking you need to do things on your own without anyone's support. There is nothing wrong with letting people who love you help you.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: There’s a saying that goes, the devil doesn’t waste energy on the souls he already has. Think about it: the tempting path is often the one that’s easy, quick, and glamorous. So when hardships come knocking and it feels like the devil is throwing everything at you, perhaps it’s because you’re on to something right. Embrace the struggle; it’s often a sign you’re on the path to something truly meaningful
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: You will find that if you look for the light, you can often find it. but if you look for the dark, that is all you will ever see.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: To find light one must be in the dark in order to find wisdom
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: Good Times Become Good Memories, But Bad Times Make Good Lessons
quotes.speaker: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: Keeping a level head is a sign of a great leader
quotes.speaker: Iroh

quotes.quote: The strength of your heart makes you who you are
quotes.speaker: Katara

quotes.quote: Harsh words can't solve problems; action will
quotes.speaker: Aang

quotes.quote: With fierce determination, passion, and hard work, you can accomplish anything. Raw talent is not enough
quotes.speaker: Pakku

quotes.quote: I've always had to struggle and fight, it's made me who I am
quotes.speaker: Zuko

quotes.quote: There's always a right way to do things
quotes.speaker: Katara

quotes.quote: Love is brightest in the dark
quotes.speaker: Katara

quotes.quote: Sokka, I hope you learned a little something about not letting the plans get in the way of the journey
quotes.speaker: Chong

quotes.quote: We all have the same roots, and we are all branches of the same tree
quotes.speaker: Huu

quotes.quote: People we've loved, people we've lost.. but they're not; we're still connected to them. Time is an illusion, and so is death
quotes.speaker: Huu

quotes.quote: You must never give into despair. Allow yourself to slip down that road and you surrender to your lowest instincts. In the darkest times, hope is something you give yourself. That is the meaning of inner strength.
quotes.speaker: Iroh

quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong with letting people who love you help you.
quotes.speaker: Iroh

quotes.quote: It is important to draw wisdom from many different places. If you take it from only one place, it becomes rigid and stale. Understanding others... will help you become whole.
quotes.speaker: Iroh

quotes.quote: Sometimes it hurts more to hope, and it hurts more to care
quotes.speaker: Katara

quotes.quote: As long as I'm confident with who I am, it doesn't matter what other people think
quotes.speaker: Smeller Bee

quotes.quote: While it is great to believe in one self, a little help from others can be a great blessing
quotes.speaker: Iroh

quotes.quote: Sometimes life is like this dark tunnel. You can't see the light at the end, but if you just keep moving, you will come to a better place
quotes.speaker: Iroh

quotes.quote: Power and perfection are overrated. I think you are wise to choose happiness and love
quotes.speaker: Iroh

quotes.quote: No, it's not. Look, Sokka, you're going to fail a lot before things work out. Even though you'll probably fail over and over and over again...you have to try every time. You can't quit because you're afraid you might fail.
quotes.speaker: Zuko

quotes.quote: The monks used to say that revenge is like a two-headed rat viper. While you watch your enemy go down, you're being poisoned yourself.
quotes.speaker: Aang

quotes.quote: The true mind can weather all the lies and illusions without being lost. The true heart can tough the poison of hatred without being harmed. Since beginning-less time, darkness thrives in the void, but always yields to purifying light
quotes.speaker: Lion Turtle
